name: Warhordling Orc Warrior
description: The Warhordling Orc Warrior embodies brute strength with a rugged appearance, reflecting typical orc characteristics.
memorable: Its aggressive charge ability allows for rapid engagement in combat, making it a formidable opponent despite low HP.
goals: To engage enemies aggressively and assert dominance in battle.
relations: Orcs and other humanoid warriors may be encountered alongside it.
environment: Typically found in combat scenarios, possibly in warbands or tribal settings.
strengths: Good athletic and survival skills, capable of navigating various terrains.
weaknesses: Average intelligence and charisma, limiting tactical options and social interactions.
attacks: Greataxe melee attack deals significant slashing damage with a good chance to hit.
most_powerful_ability: Aggressive Charge allows it to quickly close the distance to engage enemies.
senses: It has passive Perception of 14, reflecting sharp awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in athletics, stealth, perception, and survival, showcasing its physical abilities.
additional_information: Blend of combat and survival skills.
Average intelligence and charisma, emphasizing brute strength.
Moderate HP allows it to withstand several attacks.
Reach of 5 feet with its melee weapon attack.
Possesses minimal communication skills through limited language.
test_queries: orc warrior with aggressive charge ability
orc fighter with strong survival instincts
